title: YOUTUBE｜”不走封闭僵化的老路和改旗易帜的邪路 “
content:
How to scientifically remove a shiny screw with chinese characteristics from a moving vehicle in eighteen turns. 如何科学地从一个移动物体上十八下拧下一颗辉煌的中国特色螺丝。 A Beijing taxi driver’s special understanding of the Party’s entreaty “We wil not follow the old and rigid path” during the 18th Party Congress.

《不走封闭僵化的老路和改旗易帜的邪路》 English Subtitles

视频在Youtube上，如墙内读者无法观看，请发电邮至 cdtv@chinadigitaltimes.net，数字时代将提供基于P2P技术的Youtube视频下载方式。
